title: Power plant at Norochcholai breakdown again
body_lines: The Ceylon Electricity Board (CEB) has informed of a technical breakdown in one of the 270MW power plants in Norochcholai, Power and Energy Minister Kanchana Wijesekera said.
"CEB commenced repair work and assured that they will reconnect within 5 days and manage the power cuts without further extensions to it by using thermal and hydro plants," the minister said.
